last_episode_to_air.name: Episode 4
last_episode_to_air.overview: When Ellie meets Chloe it leads to a shocking revelation, and the race is on as Ellie and Carter race to prevent an impending gas disaster and stop the "Fixers".

name: The Fixer
overview: NTSB investigator Ellie Molaro, suspicious of the "official answers” to an oil rig disaster, spearheads a private investigation with a secret tipster named Carter who claims that a conspiracy of “Fixers” are behind the worst disasters in the country, all rigged to manipulate the stock market, and reap billions for a select few.

episodes.name: Episode 1
episodes.overview: Investigator Ellie Molaro leads a private investigation into an oil rig disaster alongside covert tipster Carter. Christian Paul and Tony Calabretta star.

episodes.name: Episode 2
episodes.overview: When Ellie is called to Chicago to help with a new case, Carter follows and together they attempt to track down a suspect in a train crash.

episodes.name: Episode 3
episodes.overview: Ellie and Carter, who is badly wounded, escape to safety after making their way through a forest inferno. They hide out in a motel and Ellie learns she cannot trust anyone.

episodes.name: Episode 4
episodes.overview: When Ellie meets Chloe it leads to a shocking revelation, and the race is on as Ellie and Carter race to prevent an impending gas disaster and stop the "Fixers".
